Author: grossenten98
Text: Yesterday a friend offered me some Cheetos (completely unplanned) but I gave it a try :)  Well happy Thursday, may it be as good as possible guys! (/◕ヮ◕)/

Author: paraphrasis
Text: I often have the same feelings, so I totally get it. Your feelings are valid. It was really really sweet of her, and it’s understandable that you feel bad about it. Struggling with an ED sucks, and makes us do stuff that sometimes feel horrible. But you accepted the drink, even if it scared you. And the fact that you think about this, and appreciate a gesture that you didn’t want to deal with in the first place, should be seen as an accomplishment! You realize that this is a problem, yet is grateful. You are a good person and a good friend, and you shouldn’t be so hard on yourself. You did your best, and that is good enough!
